;---------------------------------------------------------;
; SAM Ortho Transition Support
; Added By Durfsurn 2.08.2020
;---------------------------------------------------------;
;---SAM 8 to Street/SAM Transitions---
;revised by Tarkus 15 April 2021

;to/from Street
0x5E54B800,1,0,0x5E5C0080,0,0=0x5E54B800,1,0,0x5E5C8800,2,0
0x5E54B800,3,0,0x5E5C0080,0,0=0x5E54B800,3,0,0x5E5C8800,2,0
0x5E54B800,1,0,0x5E5C0080,2,0=0x5E54B800,1,0,0x5E5C8800,2,0
0x5E54B800,3,0,0x5E5C0080,2,0=0x5E54B800,3,0,0x5E5C8800,2,0

;rot 2 point (SAM Set number less than current)-

;to/from SAM 0
0x5E54B800,1,0,0x5E5C0000,0,0=0x5E54B800,1,0,0x5E5C0800,2,0
0x5E54B800,3,0,0x5E5C0000,0,0=0x5E54B800,3,0,0x5E5C0800,2,0

;to/from SAM 1
0x5E54B800,1,0,0x5E5C1100,0,0=0x5E54B800,1,0,0x5E5C1800,2,0
0x5E54B800,3,0,0x5E5C1100,0,0=0x5E54B800,3,0,0x5E5C1800,2,0

;to/from SAM 2
0x5E54B800,1,0,0x5E5C2200,0,0=0x5E54B800,1,0,0x5E5C2800,2,0
0x5E54B800,3,0,0x5E5C2200,0,0=0x5E54B800,3,0,0x5E5C2800,2,0

;to/from SAM 3
0x5E54B800,1,0,0x5E5C3300,0,0=0x5E54B800,1,0,0x5E5C3800,2,0
0x5E54B800,3,0,0x5E5C3300,0,0=0x5E54B800,3,0,0x5E5C3800,2,0

;to/from SAM 4
0x5E54B800,1,0,0x5E5C4400,0,0=0x5E54B800,1,0,0x5E5C4800,2,0
0x5E54B800,3,0,0x5E5C4400,0,0=0x5E54B800,3,0,0x5E5C4800,2,0

;to/from SAM 5
0x5E54B800,1,0,0x5E5C5500,0,0=0x5E54B800,1,0,0x5E5C5800,2,0
0x5E54B800,3,0,0x5E5C5500,0,0=0x5E54B800,3,0,0x5E5C5800,2,0

;to/from SAM 6
0x5E54B800,1,0,0x5E5C6600,0,0=0x5E54B800,1,0,0x5E5C6800,2,0
0x5E54B800,3,0,0x5E5C6600,0,0=0x5E54B800,3,0,0x5E5C6800,2,0

;to/from SAM 7
0x5E54B800,1,0,0x5E5C7700,0,0=0x5E54B800,1,0,0x5E5C7800,2,0
0x5E54B800,3,0,0x5E5C7700,0,0=0x5E54B800,3,0,0x5E5C7800,2,0

;-rot 0 point (SAM Set number greater than current)-

;to/from SAM 9
0x5E54B800,1,0,0x5E5C9900,0,0=0x5E54B800,1,0,0x5E5C8900,0,0
0x5E54B800,3,0,0x5E5C9900,0,0=0x5E54B800,3,0,0x5E5C8900,0,0

;to/from SAM 10 (A)
0x5E54B800,1,0,0x5E5CAA00,0,0=0x5E54B800,1,0,0x5E5C8A00,0,0
0x5E54B800,3,0,0x5E5CAA00,0,0=0x5E54B800,3,0,0x5E5C8A00,0,0

;to/from SAM 11 (B)
0x5E54B800,1,0,0x5E5CBB00,0,0=0x5E54B800,1,0,0x5E5C8B00,0,0
0x5E54B800,3,0,0x5E5CBB00,0,0=0x5E54B800,3,0,0x5E5C8B00,0,0

;to/from SAM 12 (C)

0x5E54B800,3,0,0x5E5CCC00,0,0=0x5E54B800,3,0,0x5E5C8C00,0,0

;to/from SAM 13 (D)

0x5E54B800,3,0,0x5E5CDD00,0,0=0x5E54B800,3,0,0x5E5C8D00,0,0

0x5E54B800,3,0,0x5E5CEE00,0,0=0x5E54B800,3,0,0x5E5C8E00,0,0

0x5E54B800,3,0,0x5E5CFF00,0,0=0x5E54B800,3,0,0x5E5C8F00,0,0

;--SAM 8--
;OxO + (5e64#)
;TLA-3

0x5e54b800,1,0,0x51001000,3,0=0x5e54b800,1,0,0x5e640800,3,0
